title: OpenAI suspends developer of politician-impersonating chatbot
description:
OpenAI has suspended the developer responsible for Dean.Bot, a ChatGPT-powered chatbot designed to impersonate Democratic presidential candidate Dean Phillips. The bot, created by “cloning” startup Delphi, aimed to support Phillips in his political campaign.
